The website cannot function properly without these cookies. Cloudflare 1 Learn more about this provider mirage_cache_manifest This cookie is necessary for the cache function. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website. hodgsonsealants.com wpEmojiSettingsSupports This cookie is part of a bundle of cookies which serve the purpose of content delivery and presentation. Issuu __qca Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded with the purpose of generating reports for optimising the website content. qcSes Quantcast 3 _dlt [x2] Sets a unique ID for the session. Do not sell or share my personal information Deny Allow selection Customize Powered by Cookiebot by Usercentrics Home Construction Industry Fire Products Technical News Contact Shop Online Glass & Glazing Window & Door Installation Commercial Glazing HVAC Roofing & Cladding Modular Building Caravan & Holiday Homes Vehicle Assembly Silfix® Silicone Sealants Acrylic Sealants HY-SPEC® Hybrid Sealants Mastic Sealants Fire Protection Putty & Glazing Tapes PU Foam Tools & Consumables Customer Own Label UK’s Leading Sealant At Hodgson is Our Range Brochure Our full range of putties, silicones, acrylic sealants and butyl glazing tapes are used for a wide variety of glazing and joinery applications. Glazing Applications Our range of silicone sealants is available in a variety of colours, sizes and packaging types Window & Door Applications For making roofs, facades and building envelopes safe, weather-poof and secure Commercial Glazing Applications Sealing and bonding in HVAC applications can produce special challenges. Our thorough understanding of the market and its requirements has led to the development of a solid range of highly flexible, durable, and strong sealing solutions. HVAC Applications Because our products create such excellent, flexible, long-lasting seals with predictable movement characteristics, they have many uses in sealing and weatherproofing roofing and cladding projects. Roofing & Cladding Applications Modular Building Applications Nowhere is a strong, failsafe, weatherproof seal more important than in leisure vehicle production: motor homes, holiday homes, park homes, and touring and static caravans. Our range of sealants and tapes have been tested on all of the industry’s common substrates over many years with solutions to streamline and speed up production at every stage of the process. Caravan Applications Structurally formed to withstand the stringent requirements of the vehicle production and converting sectors, used in a wide variety of sealing and bonding tasks in the production and assembly process. Vehicle Assembly Applications Passive Fire Protection Our sealants will form an airtight seal which can halt the spread of fire and smoke through joints and seals in walls, floors, and doors. Designed to resist the spread of toxic gases and fire, and accredited to all British, European, and international standards, our products are used in the glazing of doors and screens, joints in firewalls, fire rated ductwork, architraves, and service penetrations.
